description:
◆ 70 MILLION USERS ◆

Yuka is a free mobile app that allows you to scan the barcodes of food and personal care products and instantly see their impact on your health. A rating and detailed information help you understand the analysis of each product.

When a product has a negative impact on your health, Yuka also recommends similar but healthier alternative products.

After a huge success in France, Belgium and Spain, Yuka decided to launch the UK after receiving many requests across the Channel. 

◆ A 100% INDEPENDENT PROJECT ◆

Yuka is a 100% independent project : product reviews and recommendations of healthier alternatives are done in an objective way. No brand or manufacturer can influence them in one way or another. Furthermore, there is no in-app advertising. You can access detailed information on our business model on our website (www.yuka.io).

◆ 5 MILLION REFERENCED PRODUCTS ◆

Yuka established a database that contains 3 million food products and 2 million cosmetic products.

Each food product is evaluated according to 3 objective criteria: nutritional quality, presence of additives and organic aspect of the product.

The method to analyse cosmetic products is based on the analysis of all the ingredients of the product. Each ingredient is assigned a risk level according to the latest scientific data.

---
You can choose a Yuka Premium subscription at £15/year to access a search bar, an offline mode, and unlimited history.

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. The subscription will renew automatically 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, at the same price. You can cancel your subscription at any time by going to your App Store account settings.

Terms of use: https://yuka-app.helpdocs.io/l/en/article/2a12869y56

The TeamUp Member Booking App has everything you need to find fitness classes, register for single and recurring sessions, sign waivers, purchase store items, and so much more. Stay up-to-date on your registrations and waitlist status and manage your memberships on the app.

This app is for existing members only. Register with your fitness studio or gym using their website before signing into this app. This app is not for instructors or staff.

Unlock a world of health & wellness with the Holland & Barrett app - your ultimate health & wellness companion. Whether you're looking to build muscle, eating healthier options, or find expert advice on skincare, vegan recipes, and menopause support. Our app is designed to help you achieve your goals.

Why download the Holland & Barrett App?

- Exclusive offers: Get app-only discounts, special promotions, and product deals that are too good to miss.
- Personalised recommendations: Discover products tailored to your wellness needs with suggestions for vitamins, supplements, sports nutrition, beauty, food, drinks and more.
- Rewards for Life: Earn points on every purchase, and redeem them for money off a future shop - just add your Rewards for Life card and start saving!
- Subscribe & save: Never run out of your favourite products again with easy, regular deliveries.
- Wellness inspiration: Access expert-tailored advice, recipes, at-home workouts, podcasts and more through our Health Hub.
- Scan & learn: Use the barcode scanner to easily learn about products while shopping in-store or reorder your favourites at home.
- Click & collect: Shop online and pick up your order in-store at your convenience.
- Store locator: Find your nearest branch with our handy locator, so you can shop in-person or collect your online orders.


Get everything you need to live happier, right at your fingertips. From natural beauty products, food and drink, to fitness gear and supplements, the Holland & Barrett app is the easy way to access high-quality wellness products anytime, anywhere. Plus, with fast, secure checkout and reliable delivery options, you'll never have to wait long to start your wellness journey.
 

Support your health & wellness, for overall well-being with H&B's range of vitamins. From immunity support, and skin to bone health, our high-quality products are designed to fill nutritional gaps and help you stay healthy, where possible.


 Unlock your fitness potential with H&B's sports range, packed with protein powders, BCAAs, pre-workout, and shakes. Fuel your workouts and optimise performance, whether you're hitting the gym or training for your next challenge.


Glow with H&B's beauty range. Our expertly formulated skincare and haircare products nourish and enhance your natural beauty, offering everything from skin boosters to hair-nourishing actives.


Fuel your day with H&B's food and drink range, featuring delicious, nutritious options for every lifestyle. From protein-packed snacks and meal replacements to smoothies and superfoods, our products may help you stay energised and ready for your day.


Don't miss out! Download the Holland & Barrett app today and take the next step toward a healthier, happier you! Turn on notifications so you never miss an exclusive offer, new product or health and wellness tip!

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

Join thousands of people ending their processed food intake, and regaining total control of their health and their kids health. 

Ivy is the #1 food scanner app, designed to help you regain control of your health and live longer healthier lives. Whether you’re looking to cut down or quit entirely, Ivy’s incredible database helps you reshape your relationship with unhealthy food.


**WHY THOUSANDS TRUST IVY**


EXPOSE UNHEALTHY FOODS

Scan over 3 million food products in our food database (and growing), complete with seed oils, additives, ingredients, pesticide, heavy metals, microplastics, environment and packaging information.


MAKE INFORMED FOOD CHOICES

Take Ivy to the supermarket and scan as you shop to see everything you need to know about the food you’re consuming at a glance.


KEEP YOUR FAMILY HEALTHY

Use Ivy to ensure your family only eat healthy and vital foods to keep everyone living long and happy.


TRACK YOUR PROGRESS

Monitor your improvements in energy, mental clarity, and overall well-being with our real-time progress tracker. Don’t just notice the difference—measure it.


MANAGE YOUR GROCERIES

Build your own grocery list using real products and easily glance at how processed your list is overall.


INCREASE YOUR HEALTH SPAN

By eliminating seed oils, additives, unhealthy ingredients, microplastics, heavy metals, and pesticides, you’ll increase your health span and live longer, happier lives for your family and friends. 


**REAL FEEDBACK FROM OUR USERS**

“I’ll never buy groceries without scanning them with Ivy first.”


“Most other apps focus on nutrition whereas Ivy focuses on food quality and processing which is arguably one of the most important things!”


“Ivy is one of the best investments I’ve made into my health.”


“I cannot believe how processed my grocery shops used to be before I downloaded Ivy and started scanning foods in the supermarket.”


SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION*


Consider IVY PRO and enjoy full access to all features and content. If you choose a IVY PRO subscription, payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.


The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your iTunes Account Settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends. From iTunes Account settings you can manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your iTunes Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. If you subscribe before your trial ends, the remaining free trial period will be forfeited when your purchase is confirmed.

**DISCLAIMER: Seek a doctor's advice in addition to using this app for medical decisions.**

Privacy Policy: https://www.ivyfoodapp.com/privacy-policy

Terms of Use: https://www.ivyfoodapp.com/terms-of-service


Do you want to help make the Ivy: Processed Food Tracker an even better app? We always welcome your suggestions and feedback to support@ivyfoodapp.com.

EVERYBODY WELCOME  
From low-cost flexible memberships and 24 hour opening times, to quality gym equipment and classes included, there are loads of reasons why people love PureGym. Our mission is to help people everywhere to lead a healthy and happy life every day. 

Using the PureGym App is the best way to get the most from your gym membership. Our great features ensure you’re able to manage your membership in the palm of your hand.

Features include:

CONTACTLESS ENTRY
Gain quick, contactless access to the gym by using the entry scanner on the app.

LIVE ATTENDANCE TRACKER
Plan your visit to the gym by checking how busy the gym is using our live attendance tracker.

BOOK & MANAGE CLASSES
You can book any of the classes available at your gym from the app and if you change your mind, can cancel them in just a few taps. 

FREE WORKOUTS
Choose from loads of great classes and workouts on demand to try in the gym or at home.

TRACK ACTIVITY
Track your attendance and build good habits so you can monitor your progress and make achieving your fitness goals easier.

MANAGE YOUR MEMBERSHIP
Managing your membership in the PureGym app is easy. From changing your gym to updating your payment details – this can all be managed at your fingertips.


EVERYBODY WELCOME
We welcome everyone regardless of gender, sexuality, size, age, ethnicity or ability. Our gyms are friendly, supportive and judgement free spaces where everybody can come in, work out and leave feeling good. Come and join us today and enjoy a range of benefits:

* No contract memberships
* Open 24 hours
* Classes included in your membership
* Huge range of quality kit
* Experienced personal trainers

YOUR FITNESS COMMUNITY
Discover what’s new in the health, fitness and wellbeing community, including free workouts and nutritional hints and tips.

INSIDE THE GYM
Our gyms are designed with you in mind, from the way the gym is laid out, to the range of equipment available.

The My Bupa app lets you take care of your health, dental cover and wellbeing on the go. You can view your cover information, claims history and treatment information without having to call us. And keep your mind and body healthy with resources you can keep coming back to. It’s also how you access blua, digital health by Bupa. 

With My Bupa, you can:

• Take control of your cover: Access your cover details, benefits, and see your claims history. 
• Stay active: Explore expert-led fitness classes, programmes and workout plans for all levels. From HIIT to yoga and pilates, there’s something for everyone.  
• Be mindful: Slow down with guided meditations to help you focus and calm your thoughts. Explore wellbeing guides on topics like sleep, eating better and how to manage anxiety. 
• Get expert health advice: We’re here to get you the right care - whether it’s talking to a GP, physio, nurse or mental health specialist. 
• Request treatment: We’ll pre-authorise the healthcare you’re covered for, then help you find a clinic and consultant. 
• View pre-authorisations: Get information about your approved health cover treatments. 
• View dental benefits: If you’ve got a Bupa Dental Plan, check your claims and see an overview of your total and remaining benefits. 
• Get your health reports: View your health assessment reports in the app, as soon as they’re ready.

We’re always working on exciting new updates and features to make managing your cover even easier. Download the app today and join the thousands of customers already using My Bupa.

For Bupa Well+ customers, get the My Bupa app to access your subscription.

Move your body 

Explore expert-led fitness classes for all levels. From HIIT to yoga and pilates, there’s something for everyone.  
Our fitness programmes are made up of classes progressing in difficulty as you go. Great for trying a new exercise or building strength or stamina.  
You can also try an exercise plan for short, effective exercises with demos that focus on specific activities or an area of your body. 
 
Be mindful 
Slow down with guided meditations to help you focus and calm your thoughts. 
Explore wellbeing guides on topics like sleep, eating better and how to manage anxiety or depression. 

 

Get expert health advice 
We’re here to get you the right care - whether it’s talking to a GP, physio, nurse or mental health specialist.

Track progress toward your nutrition, water, fitness, and weight loss goals with MyFitnessPal. This all-in-one food tracker and health app is like having a nutrition coach, meal planner, and food diary with you at all times.

MyFitnessPal isn’t another restrictive diet app. This is a health app to help you learn about your habits … see how you eat … make smarter food choices … find motivation & support ... and conquer your health goals.

Download and start your free 30-day Premium trial to access exclusive food tracking, fitness logging tools, and expert guidance. You’ll soon discover why MyFitnessPal is the #1 food and nutrition tracker in the U.S., a GQ 2020 Fitness Awards “Best Fitness App,” and has been featured in the New York Times, Wall Street Journal, the Today Show, and U.S. News & World Report.

SO MUCH MORE THAN A CALORIE TRACKER & FOOD JOURNAL

It’s like having a dietitian, personal trainer, and nutrition coach at your fingertips.

Log Food – Easy-to-use tools make food tracking quick and simple
Record Activity – Add workouts and steps with the fitness tracker
Customize Your Goals – Weight loss, weight gain, weight maintenance, nutrition & fitness
See Your Progress – Track at a glance, or analyze nutrition & calories in detail
Learn From a Registered Dietitian – Meal Plans customized for your target calories, whether you want to lose or gain weight—with access to our Meal Planner tool
Stay Inspired – 500+ healthy goal-focused recipes and 50 workouts keep routines fresh and fun
Connect With Community – Find friends and motivation in our active forums

A CLOSER LOOK AT FEATURES & BENEFITS

Gain Valuable Insights Through Food Logging

Discover which foods fuel you best. It’s not just a diet app, calorie counter to lose weight, or a faster way to fat loss—it’s about holding yourself accountable and understanding what you put in your body.

One of the Largest Food Databases – Track calories in over 14 million foods (including restaurant dishes)
Fast & Easy Food Tracker Tools – Type to search, add foods from your history, or quick-add calories
Bar Code & Meal Scan: Log store-bought foods and entire meals using your phone’s camera
Calorie Tracker – Automatically count calories and see your daily progress
Macro Tracker – See carbs, fat & protein breakdown by gram or percentage—no need for a separate carb tracker or keto diet app!
Nutrition Tracker and Insights – Analyze nutrition intake and set specific goals for macros, cholesterol, sodium, fiber & more
Water Logging – Easily keep track of your water intake. 

Customize Your App Experience

Choose settings that help you achieve your goals.

Custom Goals – Track calories by meal or day, set up macro goals & more
Personalized Dashboards – Pick stats you want to see at a glance
Net Carbs Mode/Carb Tracker – To simplify a low carb or keto diet, view net (not total) carbs
Protein Counter – Set your protein goals and track how much you eat during the day
Add Your Own Foods/Meal Tracker – Save recipes and meals for quick logging
Connect 50+ Apps & Devices – From fitness tracker and smartwatch apps, including the Health app
Track With Apple Watch – A calorie tracker, water tracker, and macro tracker on your watch face.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

MyFitnessPal is free to download and use. If you upgrade to MyFitnessPal Premium, we offer monthly & annual auto-renewing subscriptions.

Payment is charged to your credit card through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless you turn off auto-renewal in iTunes Account Settings after purchase, or cancel your subscription at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period.

View our full terms & conditions and privacy policy: https://www.myfitnesspal.com/privacy-and-terms

Strava makes fitness tracking social. We house your entire active journey in one spot – and you get to share it with friends. Here’s how:

• Record everything – runs, rides, hikes, yoga and over 30 other sport types. Think of Strava as the home of your movement.

• Discover anywhere – our Routes tool uses de-identified Strava data to intelligently recommend popular routes based on your preferences. You can also build your own.

• Build a support network – Strava’s about celebrating movement. Here you’ll find your community and cheer each other on.

• Train smarter – get data insights to understand your progress and see how you improve. Your Training Log is the record of all your workouts.

• Get more from your workout – Powered by AI, Athlete Intelligence turns workout data into into instant insights. Keeping you motivated and ready for the next workout – without the guesswork.

• Move safer – share your real-time location with loved ones while outdoors for an extra layer of safety.

• Sync your favourite apps and devices – Strava is compatible with thousands of them (Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin – you name it).

• Join and create challenges – join millions in monthly challenges to chase new goals, collect digital badges and stay accountable.

• Embrace the unfiltered – your feed on Strava is filled with real efforts from real people. That’s how we motivate each other.

• Whether you’re a world-class athlete or a total beginner, you belong here. Just record and go.

Strava includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.
Strava uses HealthKit to export your Strava activities into the Health app and to read heart rate and biometric data.

You can subscribe and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the ‘Manage Subscription’ page in settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Terms of Service: https://www.strava.com/legal/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.strava.com/legal/privacy

Meet your new self-care best friend! Finch is a self-care pet app that helps you feel prepared and positive, one day at a time. Take care of your pet by taking care of yourself! Choose from a wide variety of self-care exercises personalized for you.

THE BEST DAILY SELF-CARE APP

Struggling with stress, mental health, or need motivation? Is self-care a chore? Finch makes self-care finally feel rewarding, lightweight, and fun. Complete quick self-care exercises to grow your pet, earn rewards, and improve mental health! People who struggle with mental health, goals, meditation, and journaling found it easier to be mindful with their self-care pet in the Finch app!

REVIEWS

- "I’ve tried other apps for being thankful and thinking positive but never used them long. I enjoy this one because the virtual pet is really cute and it takes just a moment to be honest about I really feel."
- "As someone who struggles with anxiety and depression, I have tried many journaling apps and mood trackers. All of them felt like a chore, but not Finch! Even if I am not feeling like journaling or even facing my emotions, I can do so in order to help Finch."

QUICK CHECK INS

- Start mornings with quick mood checks and energize your pet to go exploring! Choose from a variety of quick mindful habits from goal tracking and bullet journaling to mindful breathing exercises and quizzes!
- End days in moments of gratitude with your self-care pet where they'll be back from adventures to share stories with you! Destress, reflect, and recognize your positive moments.

MINDFUL EXERCISES

Strengthen your mental health by increasing resilience, productivity, and gratitude with self-care exercises! Finch helps you hit goals and sustain healthy habits with your self-care pet!

- Goal Tracker: set goals and celebrate wins you've accumulated from healthy habits.
- Bullet Journaling: guided bullet journaling prompts to clear the mind, track important moments, and practice gratitude.
- Breathing: guided breathing to calm nerves, increase focus, energize your mind, and sleep better.
- Quizzes: quick quizzes to understand your mental health by tracking your anxiety, depression, body image appreciation, and more.
- Mood Tracker: check on yourself and access mood trends to understand what has been lifting you up or bringing you down.
- Quotes: read motivational quotes to lift your mood and gain new perspective.
- Sleep: Unwind yourself for good sleep with guided breathing and next day goal planning.
- Insights: get insights on your mental health from combined analytics on your mood tracker, bullet journal tags, goal tracker, and quizzes.

SAY HI!

- TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@finchcare
- Discord: https://discord.gg/finchfam
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/finchcare/
- Facebook: https://facebook.com/groups/finchfam
- Email: support@befinch.com
- Terms of service: https://befinch.notion.site/Finch-Care-PBC-Terms-of-Service-710ffd2b56ce4bc8ac8063461a3bb96e
- Privacy policy: https://befinch.notion.site/Finch-Care-PBC-Privacy-Policy-c2e466cb17f34edd87d0c353b5742ac5

Whether you hike, bike, run, or walk, AllTrails is your companion and guide to the outdoors. Find detailed reviews and inspiration from a community of trailgoers like you. We’ll help you plan, live, and share your outdoor adventures.

AllTrails offers more than a running app or fitness activity tracker. It helps you discover dog-friendly, child-friendly, pram-friendly, or wheelchair-friendly trails, and more with turn-by-turn navigation to guide you through it.

◆ Discover trails: Search over 500,000 trails around the world by location, interest, skill level, and more.
◆ Plan your next adventure: Get in-depth trail info, from reviews to conditions to GPS driving directions — and save your favorite trails for later.
◆ Stay on course: Stick to your planned route or chart your own course with confidence when you navigate on the trail with your phone or Wear OS device. Use Wear OS to leverage tiles and complications to start and monitor your activities.
◆ Find points of interest: Discover waterfalls, historic sites,  photo spots, and more along the trail.
◆ Grow your community: Celebrate outdoor adventures and find inspiration by connecting with trailgoers like you.
◆ Share your outdoor adventures: Easily post trails and activities on Facebook, Instagram, or WhatsApp.
◆ Record your activity: Capture your stats, leave reviews, and post photos of your favorite walking trails.

Discover trails that fit your nature. Trails for workout planners, hikers, walkers, mountain bikers, trail runners, and casual cyclists. Whether you’re pushing your limits or pushing a pram, there’s something out there for everyone. Let AllTrails help you find it.

► Do more outdoors with AllTrails Plus►
Spend less time figuring out where you want to be, and more time enjoying where you are. With offline maps, wrong-turn alerts, and extra safety and planning features, your annual subscription gives you more tools for more adventures.

◆ Search by distance from you to find the closest trails.
◆ Plan for the elements like ground conditions, weather, air quality, UV index, and more.
◆ See how conditions change along the trail and preview by time of day.
◆ Unplug completely or pack a backup with printed maps.
◆ Explore without signal with map downloads for trails, parks, and entire areas.
◆ Live share your trail activity with friends and family.
◆ Prepare for the hills ahead: Follow topo maps and trail maps in 3D.
◆ Focus on the view, not the map, with wrong-turn alerts.
◆ Give back: AllTrails donates a portion of every subscription to 1% for the Planet.
◆ Explore ad-free: Remove occasional ads by subscribing

► New! Explore to the fullest with AllTrails Peak ►

Make the most of your time on the trail with our newest premium membership. Chart your own course, plan ahead for conditions, and explore popular trails — with all the offline benefits of Plus.

◆ Create your own route from scratch, or modify one of 500,000+ existing trails.
◆ Explore the most popular places with heatmaps of recent trail activity.
◆ Access every Plus and Base feature, too.

Whether you’re geocaching in a national park, browsing bucket-list mountain bike routes, or planning a trail run to clear your head, AllTrails Plus and Peak make the great outdoors even greater.

Get the fitness, sports, and health results you want with the Technogym app and Technogym Coach.

Whether you train at the gym, at home, or on the go, enjoy access to an on-demand library of 1,000+ workouts, personalized workout programs, classes, the Wellness Magazine, individual and community challenges, and more to stay on track with your goals and boost your performance. 


GET A PERSONALIZED PRECISION PROGRAM 

The AI-powered Technogym Coach gives you guidance and encouragement, whether you want to start working out, get stronger, tone up, play your favorite sport better, improve your athletic performance, or simply live a longer and healthier life. 

Just tell Technogym Coach what your goals are, how much time you want to work out, and what equipment you have on hand, and you’ll get a personalized Precision Program you can adjust any time based on your location, equipment, needs, and progress.


ACCESS 1000+ ON-DEMAND WORKOUTS

A huge on-demand workout library – including HIIT, yoga, Pilates, strength training, mindfulness and stretching, and more – is just a swipe away with new workouts added each week.

Browse workouts for any goal, muscle group, and level, whether you want self-guided exercises, to work out on equipment with instructor-led classes, do bodyweight workouts at home, or train outdoors. 


CREATE YOUR OWN WORKOUTS 

Decide your own training journey with the workout builder feature, whether your focus is on weightlifting, cardio, or bodyweight exercises. Create, save, and edit your own workouts for specific days, training needs, and goals, and track your progress over time. 


GET WELLNESS TIPS & NEWS

Stay up to date on the latest news and tips in the world of training, lifestyle, nutrition, and mindfulness with the Wellness Magazine.


TEST YOURSELF WITH CHALLENGES

A bit of healthy competition is a great way to test your limits and stay motivated. Join our challenges across a wide range of activities and sports and collect badges to show off.


MONITOR YOUR PROGRESS

The Technogym app is compatible with major third-party tracking devices and apps and heart rate monitors as well as Apple Health and Apple Watch so you can track your activities, health numbers and stats, and know where you are in your training journey. 

You can also monitor your health information in your personal Wellness Passport area of the app; collect MOVEs (units that measure how active you are); and check your MOVERGY level (your two-week MOVEs average).

Read our Terms of Use at https://cdnmedia.mywellness.com/privacy/v2/en/conditions.html and our Privacy Policy at https://cdnmedia.mywellness.com/privacy/v2/en/privacy.html

PhysiApp®: Clinical exercises at your fingertips.

* Crystal clear and professionally narrated videos show you how to perform your exercises correctly.

* Always remember when to do your exercises thanks to in-app reminders.

* Once downloaded, access your videos even when you have no Internet access.

* PhysiApp® tracks your progress and feedback in real-time, allowing your healthcare provider to better support you based on clear outcome data.

Important: this app is not intended to diagnose any condition. Your exercise program on this app will have been assigned to you after consulting with a healthcare professional. Please seek a healthcare practitioner’s advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.

The features in our app are designed for you to get the most from your membership and help you fully maximise your experience at The Gym Group.  

Download now to get the following features: 

CONTACTLESS ENTRY 

Gain quick and easy access to your gym by scanning the QR code with your app. 

PLAN YOUR VISIT 

Check the real-time capacity of your gym using both the number of people and the percentage capacity to help you plan your visit. 

BOOK AND MANAGE CLASSES 

You can book any available classes at your gym through the app as well as managing all your existing bookings and organising face to face inductions or PT taster sessions. 

WORKOUT HUB  

Find a range of workouts tailored to your needs with personalised workout recommendations. Whether you are just starting out or looking to mix up your routine, the Workout Hub has something for everyone.  
The app also connects to HealthKit so you can track your activity from your device or wearable.  
If you prefer to follow your own routine, customise and create the perfect workout with the create your own workout feature using our extensive exercise library. The Hub also includes links to helpful videos that explain how to perform exercises.  

ON-DEMAND FIIT WORKOUT VIDEOS 

We have partnered with Fiit to provide all Gym Group members with unlimited access to hundreds of video workouts led by world-class trainers to help you take your in-gym training to the next level. 

MANAGE YOUR MEMBERSHIP 

We’ve made it easy to manage your membership from the palm of your hand. 
 
DEALS 

View all your Gym Group deals from our carefully selected partners.

Easy calorie tracking made for UK users. Whether you’re aiming to lose weight, build healthier habits or simply understand what you’re eating, Nutracheck makes it simple. Track your food, macros, and exercise with the UK’s best food database. Try free for 7 days.

• Track calories & 7 key nutrients

• UK food database – 500,000+ items

• Barcode scanner & photo search

• Exercise tracking with app & device sync

• Apple Watch app & widgets

• Build & save your own recipes

• Community support

FLEXIBLE GOALS
Weight loss, gain, maintenance or 5:2 fasting – set your own calorie and macro targets to suit your goal.

NUTRITION MADE EASY
Track 7 key nutrients: carbs, protein, fat, sat fat, sugar, salt and fibre. Set reminders for water and 5-a-day.

FAST, ACCURATE LOGGING
Search verified UK foods by keyword or barcode – including items from Tesco, Asda, Sainsbury’s, Aldi, Lidl, M&S, Waitrose, HelloFresh, Gousto, and top eating out places like Greggs, Wetherspoon, Nando’s, Costa and Pret. See product photos for quick recognition.

BUILT-IN EXERCISE TRACKER
Log workouts manually or sync with Fitbit, Garmin, and Apple Health. Choose from 1,000+ activities.

ON-THE-GO-TOOLS
Use the Apple Watch App or iOS widgets to see your progress instantly – no need to open the app.

RECIPE & MEAL BUILDER
Calorie count your home-cooked meals. Add your own or use our ready-made favourites.

SUPPORTIVE COMMUNITY

The Garmin Connect™ app is your one-stop source for health and fitness data. Whether you’re training for a race, keeping active or just staying on top of your health, Garmin Connect provides the information and inspiration you need to reach your goals. 
 
Once you pair your phone(1)with a Forerunner®, Venu®, fēnix® or another compatible Garmin device(2), you can review your tracked activities and health metrics. Plus, you can create workouts, build courses and challenge your friends on the leaderboard. 
 
With Garmin Connect you can: 
 
- Personalize your home screen, so the most helpful information is instantly visible 
- Analyze your activities with detailed statistics(3)
- Create customized workouts and courses 
- Review trends in health metrics like heart rate and steps 
- Earn badges for accomplishments 
- Sync with other apps like Apple Health, MyFitnessPal and Strava 
- Get support for Garmin devices and their features 
 
Learn more about Garmin devices and how they work with the Garmin Connect app at Garmin.com. 
 
(1) See compatibility requirements at Garmin.com/BLE 
(2) See a full list of compatible devices at Garmin.com/devices
(3) See Garmin.com/ataccuracy  
 
Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

Focus, relax, and sleep through the power of sound. Endel creates AI-powered sounds designed to support your everyday life. Backed by science, and enjoyed by millions worldwide.

Endel is powered by its patented core AI technology. It takes inputs like location, environment, and heart rate, to create the optimal personalized soundscape. This happens on the fly and allows Endel to reconnect your state with your circadian rhythm.

Get access to the following classic soundscapes at home, work, or on the move to relax, concentrate, and minimize distractions and brain fatigue:


• Focus – boosts your productivity by helping you concentrate for longer

• Sleep – soothes you into a deep sleep with soft, gentle sounds

• Relax – calms your mind to create feelings of comfort and safety

• Move – feel grounded and present while walking, hiking, or running


ENDEL PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION


Alongside the classics, the Premium package contains the following Endel Soundscapes and features:

• Colored Noise – choose one of 9 colors of noise to focus, relax, sleep, and mask outside sound

• Study – improves concentration and keeps you calm while studying or working

• Dynamic Focus – get your perfect productivity support with real-time sound tuning

• Hibernation – nourish your ears with cozy sounds for cold-season slumber

• Nature Elements – nurture the mind with sounds of nature, your way

• Rainy Outside – cozy up to the gentle patter of rain, blended with sleep-aiding sounds

• Recovery – revives your wellbeing with sounds engineered to lower anxiety

• Spatial Orbit – venture into a more peaceful dimension with an immersive Spatial Audio experience

• Focus Timer – the famous interval work method, upgraded with science-backed Focus sounds


On top of the much-loved original Endel soundscapes, Endel works with innovative artists and thinkers to create unique experiences. These collaborative Endel Soundscapes are available for Premium users:


• James Blake: Wind Down – prepare your body for sleep with soothing sounds from an award-winning artist

• Grimes: AI Lullaby – supports sleep for babies and adults with original sounds and vocals from Grimes

• Plastikman: Deeper Focus – a deep focus techno soundscape created with Richie Hawtin

• Alan Watts: Wiggly Wisdom – soothing and motivation spoken word soundscape, infused with the playful wisdom from Alan Watts

• Miguel: Clarity Trip – elevate your every step with original sounds from Miguel

Endel Pacific is the patented technology that powers our apps and integrations. 

All soundscapes are available offline.

Apart from the Premium sounds and features, Endel Premium users get access to the exclusive Apple Podcast shows.


SUBSCRIPTION TERMS


Skip the payment screen by tapping “X” in the top-right corner of the offer. The Free Edition of Endel will start automatically.

You can get access to Endel Premium by subscribing to a recurrent plan of your choice or with a one-time Lifetime purchase.

Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

Payment will be charged to your Apple account at confirmation of purchase.

Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be provided.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.

No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.

description:
HeartIn: Your Comprehensive Heart Health Companion

Welcome to HeartIn, the app designed to empower you to take control of your heart health with ease and precision. Utilizing cutting-edge technology, HeartIn transforms your smartphone into a powerful heart rate monitor, providing personalized insights and resources to help you lead a healthier lifestyle. From measuring your heart rate and variability to monitoring your stress and energy levels, HeartIn offers an all-in-one solution for your cardiovascular wellness.

Key Features

Heart Rate Measurement & Variability (HRV)
With HeartIn, measuring your heart rate is as simple as placing your finger over your smartphone's camera. Our innovative technology uses the camera and flash to detect subtle changes in light absorption, giving you accurate readings in just seconds.

Heart Score
After each measurement, receive a personalized heart score that evaluates your heart health based on age and gender benchmarks. HeartIn calculates this score with HRV (Heart Rate Variability) as its essential metric, integrating age and gender to provide a comprehensive view of your heart health.

HRV Graphs
Track your heart rate variability over time with intuitive line graphs, providing insights into your stress levels, recovery, and overall heart health.

Pulse Rate Monitoring
Seamlessly integrate with your Apple Watch for real-time pulse rate monitoring. This feature ensures you stay informed about your cardiovascular status throughout the day, helping you recognize patterns and make informed lifestyle choices.

Stress & Energy Monitoring
Understand how your daily activities impact your well-being with our stress and energy monitoring features. By analyzing your HRV, HeartIn provides daily insights and recommendations to help you manage stress and boost your energy levels effectively.

Blood Pressure & Blood Oxygen Logging
Easily log your blood pressure and oxygen saturation levels within the app. Track your readings over time with user-friendly history logs that visualize trends, allowing you to make informed decisions about your health.

AI Chatbot & Self-Care Resources
Engage with our health-focused AI chatbot for instant responses to your heart health queries. Explore a curated library of articles on heart health, wellness tips, and daily health insights, all tailored to support your journey towards a healthier lifestyle.

User-Centric Design
HeartIn is crafted with user experience in mind, featuring a clean and intuitive interface that allows for easy navigation between measurements, logs, and self-care resources. Whether you're a health enthusiast or just starting your wellness journey, HeartIn offers a seamless experience for everyone.

Conclusion
Take the first step towards better heart health with HeartIn. Whether you're monitoring your heart rate, managing stress, or exploring self-care resources, HeartIn is your trusted partner in health and wellness. Download HeartIn today and empower yourself with the knowledge and tools to lead a healthier life!

Terms and Conditions: static.heartrate.info/terms-conditions-en.html
Privacy Policy: static.heartrate.info/privacy-enprivacy-en.html
Community Guidelines: static.heartrate.info/terms-conditions-en.html

Reach your best running goals with Runna: your go-to running coach and training partner for every distance and goal! With tailored training plans built by world-class coaches to help you achieve your goals. 

Whether you're lacing up your Nikes for a casual 5k or preparing for the challenging Ultra Marathon, this app is your pocket-sized, top-rated running coach. From 5k, 10k, half marathon, marathon, to the ultra distance, we've got you covered. Rated 4.9/5 on Trustpilot, Runna offers an elite training experience that's second to none.

WHY RUNNA IS THE BEST FIT FOR EVERY RUNNER:

1) Personalised Training:
Runna's expertly crafted training plans use proven science to fit your unique runner profile. Tackle any distance: 5k, 10k, half marathon, marathon or even ultra marathon, with us by your side.

2) Sync and Track:
Instantly sync your runs with Strava and monitor your workouts live on compatible devices*. Set the right pace and map your progress with ease.

3) All-Round Runner Support:
We adopt a holistic training approach, offering advice on perfect running form, nutrition, and injury management. Every runner is unique, and we cater to that individuality.

4) Strength Meets Endurance:
Enhance your strength and endurance, vital for any race distance. Our plans provide a seamless blend of running and strength training, ensuring you're race-ready.

JOIN THE RUNNA CLUB & COMMUNITY:

1) Connect Worldwide:
Become part of the Runna club: a dynamic community of global runners. Harness the motivation and camaraderie to elevate your performance.

2) Exclusive Perks:
Runna members get exclusive offers from top nutrition, apparel, and event brands. Upgrade your gear and nutrition, preparing for every long run and race.

3) Engage and Progress:
Sign up for trail runs, time-trials, or live yoga and pilates classes. Let your sweat pour, and always stay one step ahead in your training journey.

4) Expert Touch:
Questions? Need guidance? Our team of dedicated experts and customer support staff are here, ensuring you're never alone in your journey.

DIVERSE PLANS FOR EVERY GOAL & DISTANCE:

- Plans spanning from 5k, 10k, half marathon, marathon, to ultra distances.
- Starting out? Try our Couch to 5k plans.
- Boost overall strength and endurance with functional fitness plans.
- Recovery plans for post-race or injury periods.
- Prepping for a triathlon? We have specific plans for you.
- And many more designed to keep you fit and always running.

COMPATIBLE DEVICES:

Runna is compatible with a wide range of devices including Apple Watch, Garmin, COROS, Suunto and Fitbit. This ensures you can track your runs, regardless of your preferred device.

RUNNA PREMIUM:

For the ultimate running experience, subscribe to Runna Premium for monthly or annual plans. Track your progress, monitor your pace, and burn those calories with personalised workout plans and support. 

Payments and renewal:
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
- You can manage or turn off auto-renew in your Account settings at any time after purchase
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active period.

APPLE HEALTH USAGE:

Runna uses your health data to provide accurate heart rate, distance and pace information during your runs and workouts on Apple Watch. 

AGE 18+
You may download and use our App provided you are aged 18 or older. We may delete your account (and associated data) if you are under such age

Terms of use: https://www.runna.com/terms-and-conditions
Privacy policy: https://www.runna.com/privacy-policy

HOW TO USE CAL AI:

1) Answer lifestyle questions to build your plan

2) Snap a photo of your meal*

3) Get your nutritional breakdown*

If you want to get your dream body, Cal AI will help you get there with less time spent than anyone else.

We aren't another complicated diet app. We want to empower everyone to be confident in their bodies with minimal time spent, but you have to work hard. We will support you and give you the tools and information you need.

If you have any ideas or questions, please email us at team@calai.app.

NOTE: We do not offer medical advice. Any and all recommendations should be viewed as suggestions, please consult with a professional and do your own research before trying a new calorie and nutrient plan.

*FOOD SCANNING ANALYSIS RESULTS REQUIRE A SUBSCRIPTION

Whether in Club, at home or outside, get the most out of your membership with the David Lloyd Clubs App. Club members can use the App to not only book courts, group exercise classes and Personal Training sessions but they can also manage their membership and access a huge range of On-Demand workouts.

Features in the Harbour Clubs and David Lloyd Meridian Spa & Fitness Clubs App will vary from the ones list above.

Hevy is the most intuitive workout tracker & planner in the world. No ads and free. Plan your weight lifting routines, log your workouts and track your exercise progress. Join a growing community and get started today - for free!
